PrisonerInteractionModeDef.label: bloodfeed
PrisonerInteractionModeDef.description: Wardens will ignore this prisoner. When a bloodfeeder's hemogen levels are low, they may feed on this prisoner. Other prisoners who are bloodfeeders can also feed on this prisoner, if they are in the same cell.

PrisonerInteractionModeDef.label: hemogen farm
PrisonerInteractionModeDef.description: An operation to extract hemogen packs will be automatically queued on this prisoner whenever it can be done without killing them. The operation will be carried out by a doctor.
